description:
Large, spacious apartment with lots of natural light.

Large space. Close to Prospect Park and the Kings theater.

Entire apartment

Minimal

Close to Prospect Park, the Kings theater and 20 mims from Times Square.

Subway Q and B train. Cabs, busses available as well.

Apartment is equipped with one TV in the living room. The TV is equipped with Showtime, HBONow, Sling TV, Netflix, and Hulu. Directions on how to use the TV and the wifi password are posted in the apartment.
name: Welcome to Brooklyn
